verbs.description: Conservative justices and swing vote Justice Anthony Kennedy [V: appeared] [ARG1: to side with the Trump administration Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: as the Supreme Court heard oral arguments on President Donald Trump 's travel ban] .

[ARG0: Conservative justices and swing vote Justice Anthony Kennedy] appeared to [V: side] [ARG1: with the Trump administration] Wednesday as the Supreme Court heard oral arguments on President Donald Trump 's travel ban .

Conservative justices and swing vote Justice Anthony Kennedy appeared to side with the Trump administration Wednesday as [ARG0: the Supreme Court] [V: heard] [ARG1: oral arguments on President Donald Trump 's travel ban] .
